name: Drop The King
description:
Welcome to Drop The King, this is a physics game where you need to shutdown the king to became the new ruller of the kingdom! To do so fire your super arrow to the walls of the castle and drop the king!!!

HOW TO PLAY

  • Use your MOUSE to pull the string in the bow.
  • Try to hit and put the king down
  • If the king get out of the screen you loose
  • Have fun!

THIS IS ALPHA VERSION - ONLY FEW LEVELS AVAIABLE FOR TESTING
